updateSqlList: CREATE TABLE `Cooperation_Task` (`strTaskCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strProjectCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strTaskName` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,`dtCreateDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,`strTaskDescription` VARCHAR(200),`strUserCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strRuleCodes` VARCHAR(2000),PRIMARY KEY (`strTaskCode`))ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE `Cooperation_Task` (`strTaskCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strProjectCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strTaskName` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,`dtCreateDate` DATETIME NOT NULL,`strTaskDescription` VARCHAR(200),`strUserCode` VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,`strRuleCodes` VARCHAR(2000),PRIMARY KEY (`strTaskCode`))ENGINE = InnoDB;

CREATE TABLE Cooperation_Task (strTaskCode VARCHAR2(45) NOT NULL,strProjectCode VARCHAR2(45) NOT NULL,strTaskName VARCHAR2(200) NOT NULL,dtCreateDate date NOT NULL,strTaskDescription VARCHAR2(200),strUserCode VARCHAR2(45) NOT NULL,strRuleCodes VARCHAR2(2000),PRIMARY KEY (strTaskCode))
